sentences.en: A young worshipper navigates the labyrinthine corridors of a Buddhist temple at Bagan, Burma.
sentences.cn: 在缅甸蒲甘的一座佛寺中, 一位小朝圣者在迷路走廊中前行.

sentences.en: Bethlehem, West Bank: A Christian worshipper inside the Church of Nativity, believed by many to be the birthplace of Jesus Christ
sentences.cn: 约旦河西岸，伯利恒：一个基督徒礼拜者在主诞教堂内，这里被认为是许多人认为是耶稣基督诞生的地方。

sentences.en: But, in this view, God is so powerful and so transcendent that God will know the heart of the worshipper.
sentences.cn: 但是，在这个观点里，上帝是强大超群的,上帝会知晓崇拜者的心灵。

sentences.en: God is spirit and his worshipper must worship in spirit and in truth.
sentences.cn: 上帝是个灵,所以拜祂的,必须用心灵和诚实拜祂.

sentences.en: I have been as sincere a worshipper of Aurora as the Greeks.
sentences.cn: 我一直在为诚挚的一名信徒的极光是希腊人.

sentences.en: If a worshipper should make a mistake, do you not think God will know his intent?
sentences.cn: 如果崇拜者犯了错，那么,你以为上帝不知道他的意图吗

sentences.en: See! this is the blessing of the worshipper of the Lord.
sentences.cn: 看 哪,敬畏耶和华的人,必要这样蒙福.

sentences.en: The face of the worshipper must be turned towards Mecca.
These names, if repeated, are believed to give special power to the worshipper.
sentences.cn: 这些名字, 如果再三重复, 据说会给予崇拜者特殊的力量.

words.tran_cn: 崇拜的，虔诚的；尊贵的；尊敬的
